articles.title: New cosmic lens measurements deepen the Hubble tension mystery
articles.description: Scientists are testing a novel way to measure cosmic expansion using time delays in gravitationally lensed quasars. Their results match “local” measurements but clash with early-universe estimates, strengthening the mysterious Hubble tension. This mismatch could point to new physics rather than obse

articles.title: Astronomers capture sudden black hole blast firing ultra fast winds
articles.description: A sudden X-ray flare from a supermassive black hole in galaxy NGC 3783 triggered ultra-fast winds racing outward at a fifth the speed of light—an event never witnessed before.
